DOC.brief_summary: A study of the ability of montelukast to improve signs and symptoms of seasonal allergic rhinitis compared with placebo. Loratadine is included in the study as an active control.
DOC.brief_title: A Study Investigating the Effect of Montelukast in Patients With Seasonal Allergic Rhinitis (MK-0476-192)(COMPLETED)
DOC.criteria: Patient has a documented clinical history of seasonal allergic rhinitis symptoms that become worse during the study season Patient is a nonsmoker Patient is in good mental and physical health Patient is hospitalized Patient is a woman who is <8 weeks postpartum or is breast feeding Patient intends to move or vacation away during the study Patient is a current or past abuser of alcohol or illicit drugs
